title: I Love Baby Animals - Fun Children's Picture Book with Amazing Photos of Baby Animals
description: This book is perfect as a bedtime story and also for your loved ones who are learning to read.In this book you will discover the names of various baby animals. Each animal is represented by the adult with a cartoon image and a real life photo is used to represent the baby animal.Young children will have fun trying to guess and remember the names of young animals plus you will be helping them expand their vocabulary.Get your copy today!
author: David Chuka
